actions: Call local emergency services or trek guide
Stay calm and do not keep walking blindly
Look for trail markers or reflectors
Use phone torch or whistle to signal help
Stay in a visible area and save battery

natural_disasters.landslide: Move away from the slope, avoid riverbeds, and contact local authorities.
natural_disasters.flood: Move to higher ground, avoid bridges, and stay away from fast-flowing water.
natural_disasters.earthquake: Drop, Cover, Hold. Move out to open space after shaking stops.
